verses.kjv: The Spirit of the Lord GOD is upon me; because the LORD hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek; he hath sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound;
verses.ct: The Spirit of the Lord GOD rests on me, because the LORD has chosen and anointed me to bring good news to the humble. He has sent me to heal those whose hearts are shattered, to announce freedom for those held captive, and release for those locked in prison.

verses.kjv: To proclaim the acceptable year of the LORD, and the day of vengeance of our God; to comfort all that mourn;
verses.ct: He sent me to declare the year of the LORD's favor and the day when our God will bring justice, and to bring comfort to everyone who grieves.

verses.kjv: To appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness; that they might be called trees of righteousness, the planting of the LORD, that he might be glorified.
verses.ct: For those who grieve in Zion, he told me to give them crowns of beauty instead of ashes, the oil of celebration instead of mourning, and clothing of praise instead of a spirit of despair. They will be called oaks of righteousness, planted by the LORD, so that he would be glorified.

verses.kjv: And they shall build the old wastes, they shall raise up the former desolations, and they shall repair the waste cities, the desolations of many generations.
verses.ct: They will rebuild the ancient ruins, restore places that were destroyed long ago, and repair the devastated cities that had been in ruins for generations.

verses.kjv: And strangers shall stand and feed your flocks, and the sons of the alien shall be your plowmen and your vinedressers.
verses.ct: Foreigners will tend your flocks, and people from other nations will work your fields and care for your vineyards.

verses.kjv: But ye shall be named the Priests of the LORD: men shall call you the Ministers of our God: ye shall eat the riches of the Gentiles, and in their glory shall ye boast yourselves.
verses.ct: But you will be called Priests of the LORD; people will refer to you as Ministers of our God. You will enjoy the wealth of the nations, and you will take pride in their splendor.

verses.kjv: For your shame ye shall have double; and for confusion they shall rejoice in their portion: therefore in their land they shall possess the double: everlasting joy shall be unto them.
verses.ct: Instead of your shame, you will receive a double portion. Instead of disgrace, your people will celebrate what they've been given. So in their land they will inherit twice as much, and they will experience lasting joy.

verses.kjv: For I the LORD love judgment, I hate robbery for burnt offering; and I will direct their work in truth, and I will make an everlasting covenant with them.
verses.ct: "For I, the LORD, love justice. I despise robbery and wrongdoing mixed with offerings. I will faithfully reward their efforts, and I will establish an everlasting covenant with them."

verses.kjv: And their seed shall be known among the Gentiles, and their offspring among the people: all that see them shall acknowledge them, that they are the seed which the LORD hath blessed.
verses.ct: Their descendants will be recognized among the nations, and their children among all peoples. Everyone who sees them will acknowledge that they are a people the LORD has blessed.

verses.kjv: I will greatly rejoice in the LORD, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.
verses.ct: I overflow with joy because of the LORD; my soul celebrates because of my God! He has dressed me in the clothing of salvation and wrapped me in the robe of righteousness, like a groom who puts on a magnificent headdress, or a bride who adorns herself with her jewels.

verses.kjv: For as the earth bringeth forth her bud, and as the garden causeth the things that are sown in it to spring forth; so the Lord GOD will cause righteousness and praise to spring forth before all the nations.
verses.ct: Just as the ground produces its sprouts, and just as a garden makes its seeds grow, the Lord GOD will cause righteousness and praise to spring up in the sight of every nation.
